document.topic_text: ● Allegri hails 'amazing' Scudetto success : The Turin side clinched their fifth consecutive Serie A title on Monday, and the 48-year-old manager was always sure they would have a good season ~ 37 minutes ago ● 135,000 Kentucky kids have had parent in jail : LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) — A new report says Kentucky has the highest percentage of children in the nation who have had a parent in jail — a situation so detrimental that a child... ~ 38 minutes ago ● AP NewsAlert : COLUMBIA, S.C.
